content.prompt: In its original context, the work would have been placed

choices.label: on a wall to adorn a royal palace
in the inner sanctum of a temple to promote worship
on the house altar of a private residence to be used for personal devotion
in a tomb to guide a deceased person in the afterlife

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
